#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

long long a[100005];

int main()
{
    int n,m,ans=0;
    cin >> n >> m;
    
    for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
        cin >> a[i];
    }
    sort(a,a+n);
    for ( int i = n-1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
        int j = i-1;
        long long sum1 = 0,sum2 =0;
        int cnt = 0;
        while ( sum2-sum1 <= m && j >= 0 ) {
              sum2 += a[i];
              sum1 += a[j];
              j--;
              cnt++;
        }
        ans = max(ans, cnt);
    }   
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}
